mapper.select: select case when exists ( select * from mp_job_level where job_level_name = #{jobLevelName} and job_grade_id = #{jobGradeId} and (id !=#{id} or #{id} is null) and del_flag != 1 ) then 1 else 0 end as duplicateName
SELECT IFNULL(job_level_code,'000000') FROM mp_job_level WHERE id=(select max(id) from mp_job_level where job_grade_id=#{jobGradeId})

select count(*) from mp_post p, mp_userpost up , mp_staff s where p.id = up.POST_ID and s.user_id = up.USER_ID and up.USER_ID = s.user_id and s.STAFF_SCOPE = '1' and p.id in (select id from mp_post where JOB_LEVEL_ID1 = #{id} or JOB_LEVEL_ID2 = #{id})
select id,job_level_code AS code,job_level_name AS name from mp_job_level where group_id = #{groupId} and del_flag != 1
